author: stevosowl
title: solid little racer car
review:
Just built this little rally racer car.

More solid that the other cars in the collection, there is a lot of lego in this model. Surprised by the retro piece wheel-arch that reminded me of a set from the 80s

Has lights at the front and a rear spoiler, the only criticism is that the screen looks a little too lo-profile and the car has a very blocky, straight edge feel.

Does use stickers and looks better for them
